@description.name: @description
@description.body: All widget used as scrollbars must implement this interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if the user scroll

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired as soon as the scroll animation ended.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The scroll bar orientation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum value (difference between available size and content size).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Position of the scrollbar (which means the scroll left/top of the attached area's pane) Strictly validates according to {@link #maximum}. Does not apply any correction to the incoming value. If you depend on this, please use {@link #scrollTo} instead.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Factor to apply to the width/height of the knob in relation to the dimension of the underlying area.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls to the given position. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: position {Integer} Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.
@param.description: Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls by the given offset. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls by the given number of steps. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property orientation. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property orientation. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property orientation. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property maximum. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property maximum. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property maximum. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property position. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property position. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property position. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property knobFactor. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property knobFactor. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property knobFactor. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.
